weekly_top_story.headline: House Appropriations Committee Advances HHS Funding Bill with Key mRNA Funding Retained
weekly_top_story.summary: The House Appropriations Committee advanced a critical funding bill for the Department of Health and Human Services that maintains funding for mRNA projects, opposing previous cutbacks, signaling continued support for vaccine and therapeutic innovation.

stories.headline: House Reps Introduce 340B ACCESS Act to Reform Drug Pricing Program
stories.summary: Reps. Carter and Harshbarger introduced bipartisan legislation aiming to improve transparency, patient affordability, and eligibility in the 340B drug discount program to address taxpayer concerns and patient benefit gaps.
